ygData.subject: Re: The Light of the Flame!
ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson realizes that neither Kup or Nightlight could navigate through the labrynth since they were not familliar with it.  But Tucson had gotten in once

Tucson realizes that neither Kup or Nightlight could navigate through the l=
abrynth since they were not familliar with it.  But Tucson had gotten in on=
ce before, and in that time, his transmitter was able to act as an auditory=
 GPS, which guided him through the tunnel.  He takes it off, since it's an =
external fixture to his helmet, and now programs that GPS system to guide K=
up and Nightlight through the tunnel out to where Rat Trap and Quickstride =
were waiting for them.  He then hands it to Kup.

"I forgot, I'm sorry.  Bu=
t this should help you to get through..  It will tell you everything you ne=
ed to know.  When to turn right, left or go straight ahead until you reach =
Rat Trap and Quickstride outside.  It will adhere to any helmet, and it wil=
l stay fixed until you wish to take it off yourself.  I won't be needing it=
 now that I can see.  Good luck Kup, and Primus be with you."
